alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 3:40PM CDT until April 19 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN OZAUKEE AND SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 339 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grafton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Public. Multiple reports of golf ball sized hail and a report of 2 inch hail near Jackson. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Mequon, Grafton, Cedarburg, Port Washington, Jackson, Saukville, Germantown, Keowns, and Kirchhayn. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
